mapper.insert: insert into persons (nickname, first_name, second_name, first_last_name, second_last_name, email, password, url_photo, active, tx_user_id, tx_host, tx_date) values (#{nickname}, #{firstName}, #{secondName}, #{firstLastName}, #{secondLastName}, #{email}, #{password}, #{urlPhoto}, #{active}, #{txUserId}, #{txHost}, #{txDate});
